title: Bug 17825 - ControlExampleText beeps when SWT.MULTI is selected
description: Bug 17825 - ControlExampleText beeps when SWT.MULTI is selected. The application is not supposed to make a sound when this option is chosen.
OB: When selecting SWT.MULTI in ControlExampleText, the application makes a beep sound. Additionally, clicking on other buttons also triggers the beep sound.
